name: A Trip on the Dusty Trail - BrackeyJam2020
name_original: A Trip on the Dusty Trail - BrackeyJam2020
description:
A short but never ending game about climbing out of a hole. Play as Jim Bob; the noble, dignified, adventurous, clumsy hero of our story, which takes place on a hot summer day in the Kalahari Desert.

 Made for the Brackeys2020 Game Jam where the theme was: Hole. (I think I nailed it on the theme)

 I didn't get this submission done in time to submit it but it was still a lot of fun to make. First crack at (super basic) procedurally generating levels, with theoretically infinite gameplay loop. Depends how masochistic/bored you are.

Hope you enjoy this hole I dug!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: WASD / Arrow Keys
